hints.content:
The bottom bar lines up to $\purpleD{110}$.   


[[☃ image 1]]

Which section had $\purpleD{110}$ visitors?

options.alt: A bar graph shows the horizontal axis labeled Number of visitors and the vertical axis labeled Section. The horizontal axis is labeled, from left to right: 0, 20, 40, 60, 80, 100, and 120. The vertical axis is labeled from the bottom of the axis to the top of the axis as follows: question mark, question mark, question mark, question mark, and question mark. The bar line for each Section shows the following: first question mark bar line labeled 110 extends to the middle of 100 and 120, second question mark bar line extends to the middle of 60 and 80, third question mark bar line extends to 60, fourth question mark bar line extends to 80, and fifth question mark bar line extends to the middle of 80 and 100.  A purple line is drawn up from the middle of 100 and 120, which reaches to the end of the first question mark bar line labeled 110. !

hints.content:
Section | Number of visitors
:- | :-: 
History theatre| $\purpleD{110}$ 

History theatre had $\purpleD{110}$ visitors.  So, the bottom bar should be labeled $\purpleD{\text{History theatre}}$.

Now let's label the other bars.



[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A bar graph shows the horizontal axis labeled Number of visitors and the vertical axis labeled Section. The horizontal axis is labeled, from left to right: 0, 20, 40, 60, 80, 100, and 120. The vertical axis is labeled from the bottom of the axis to the top of the axis as follows: History theater, Around World, Ecostation, Water Works, and Invention. The bar line for each Section shows the following: History theater bar line extends to the middle of 100 and 120, Around World bar line extends to the middle of 60 and 80, Ecostation bar line extends to 60, Water Works bar line extends to 80, and Invention bar line extends to the middle of 80 and 100. !

question.content:
Mega created a chart and a bar graph with the numbers of visitors in each section of the museum during one hour.

Section | Number of visitors
:- | :-: 
Waterworks | $80$ 
Around the World | $70$ 
Ecostation | $60$ 
History Theater| $110$ 
Invention Convention| $90$ 

**Label each bar on the bar graph.**

[[☃ label-image 1]]

options.imageAlt: A table shows sections and the number of visitors. Waterworks had eighty vistors. Around the World had seventy vistors. Ecoxtation had sixty vistors. History Theater had one hundred ten vistors. Invention Convention had ninety visitors.
